metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7659 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: reel through 0.6.1 allows Request Smuggling attacks due to incorrectContent-Length and Transfer encoding header parsing. It is possible toconduct HTTP request smuggling attacks by sending the Content-Length headertwice. Furthermore, invalid Transfer Encoding headers were found to beparsed as valid which could be leveraged for TE:CL smuggling attacks. Note:This project is deprecated, and is not maintained any more.

criterions.comment: reel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
